snippet: This Phenomenon, which made so conspicuous a figure in the nocturnal sky of a few years since, has renewed some of its former energies during the present month of September, having been remarkably briliant on the 4th, as seen especially in Western...
lead_paragraph: This Phenomenon, which made so conspicuous a figure in the nocturnal sky of a few years since, has renewed some of its former energies during the present month of September, having been remarkably briliant on the 4th, as seen especially in Western New-York and in Canada, and returning again to our sky last evening.
